methods.name: ResetIndicatorStatus
methods.comment: This sets the cacehd status to IS_NONE so that an update is forced next frame

properties.name: mOuterFactory
properties.comment: The outer factory we should display the state for.

properties.name: mCachedIndicatorStatus
properties.comment: Save the state of the factory so that we don't change material excessively.

properties.name: mCachedHasPower
properties.comment: Save the power state of the factory

properties.name: mCachedMainMeshes
properties.comment: Not UPROPERTY as this will never live longer than it's outer, cached version of it's main meshes
